annotations.description: The Tequila Sunrise has a long and interesting history and is best known for a different recipe than the one I teach here. Getting to that modern recipe, pop...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Original Tequila Sunrise

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Blanco Tequila
.5oz (15ml) Creme de Casis
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.5oz (15ml) Grenadine
Top Soda Water
Lime Wheel Garnish

Shake and strain into collins over ice
Top with soda and garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1F96GArORtg
title: Tequila Sunrise
